sources.title: The Racket Buster (1948)
sources.description: Mighty Mouse makes a personal appearance at a movie theatre and three gangster cats capture him in an unguarded moment, rob the box-office, kidnap Pearl Pureheart, and take Might Mouse for a one-way ride. However, he free himself, rescues the girl and captures the gangsters. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-racket-buster-1948/

metadata.Plot: Mighty Mouse makes a personal appearance at a movie theatre and three gangster cats capture him in an unguarded moment, rob the box-office, kidnap Pearl Pureheart, and take Might Mouse for a one-way ride. However, he frees himself, rescues the girl and captures the gangsters.
